name: The Mansions of Shadows
description:
First person game. Or you play Erwan, a young journalist. You are investigating a missing person. Unravel mysteries and secrets. Discover the dark side of a family.

STRONG POINTS

Action in subjective view: playing Erwan, players discover the environment in subjective view.

Main Features

Investigate a missing person case. Puzzles and puzzles to solve.
Collect notes left on site that will give you answers, or even other questions!
Seek to enter them hidden, and remain on your guard, for you will be observed.
